languages.text: "Разумеется. Машина {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}остановлена{/d}. Больше ни одна душа не отправится в пасть {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Со временем мы сумеем раскрыть и остановить прочие происки культа".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Машина {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} остановлена. Больше ни одна душа не отправится в пасть {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Со временем мы сумеет раскрыть и остановить прочие происки Культа".

languages.text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Машина {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}остановлена{/d}. Больше ни одна душа не отправится в пасть {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Со временем мы сумеем раскрыть и остановить прочие происки культа".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator's{/g} machine was stopped. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the Archenemy. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the Cult."

"Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the Cult."

languages.text: “当然了。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}的机器被{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}停了下来{/d}，不会再有别的灵魂被送入{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的巨口之中。假以时日，我们必将顺利揭露邪教的其他计划，加以阻止。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."

“当然了。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}的机器被{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}停了下来{/d}，不会再有别的灵魂被送入{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的巨口之中。假以时日，我们必将顺利揭露邪教的其他计划，加以阻止。”

languages.original_text: "Of course. The Fabricator-Censor's machine was stopped. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the Archenemy. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the Cult."

languages.text: «Por supuesto. {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}Detuvimos{/d} la máquina del {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}. No volverá a enviar ni un alma más a las fauces del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Con el tiempo, conseguiremos descubrir y detener otros planes del Culto».
languages.original_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. Detuvimos la máquina del {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}. No volverá a enviar ni un alma más a las fauces del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Con el tiempo, conseguiremos descubrir y detener otros planes del Culto».

languages.text: 「もちろんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}のマシンは{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}止められた{/d}。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の口にはもう魂は送り込まれない。いずれ、我々は教団の他の陰謀を暴き、阻止することに成功するだろう」
languages.original_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}のマシンは{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}止められた{/d}。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の口にはもう魂は送り込まれない。いずれ、我々は教団の他の陰謀を暴き、阻止することに成功するだろう」
「もちろんだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}のマシンは{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}止められた{/d}。{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の口にはもう魂は送り込まれない。いずれ、我々は魔女団の他の陰謀を暴き、阻止することに成功するだろう」

languages.text: "Natürlich. Die Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censors{/g} wurde {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}aufgehalten{/d}. Es wird keine weitere Seele mehr in den Schlund des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} geschickt. Mit der Zeit werden wir noch anderen Pläne des Kults aufdecken und vereiteln."
languages.original_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Die Maschine des {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censors{/g} wurde aufgehalten. Es wird keine weitere Seele mehr in den Schlund des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} geschickt. Mit der Zeit werden wir noch anderen Pläne des Kults aufdecken und vereiteln."

languages.text: « Bien évidemment. La machine du {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} a été mise {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hors d'état de nuire{/d}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ne recevra plus d'âmes en pâture et bientôt, nous parviendrons à déjouer les manigances du culte. Ce n'est qu'une question de temps. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. The {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g}'s machine was {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}stopped{/d}. Not another soul will be sent into the mouth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In time, we will succeed in uncovering and stopping other schemes of the cult."

traits.locale_text: « Bien évidemment. La machine du {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} a été mise hors d'état de nuire. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ne recevra plus d'âmes en pâture et bientôt, nous parviendrons à déjouer les manigances du culte. Ce n'est qu'une question de temps. »

languages.text: "Ne demek? {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün{/g} makinesi {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}durdu{/d}. Artık tek bir ruh bile {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} yem olmayacak. İleride tarikatın böyle başka planlarını da bulup bozacağız."
